title: UK Property Summarisation → Database JSON Update (Step 2)

street_1.description: Primary street address or building name. Use full spelling with no abbreviations (e.g., 'Street' not 'St', 'Road' not 'Rd'). If property is TBC or address unknown, use null.

street_2.description: Secondary address line for additional location details (e.g., block name, estate name, building phase). Leave null if not applicable.

city.description: City, town, or for London properties use the specific London district (e.g., 'Hackney', 'Westminster'). Use null if unknown.

region.description: County name (e.g., 'Essex', 'Surrey') or London Borough (e.g., 'London Borough of Hackney'). Use null if unknown.

postal_code.description: Full UK postcode in standard format (e.g., 'SW1A 1AA'). Include space between outward and inward codes. Use null if not provided.

proposed_opportunity_name.description: STRICT FORMAT: Building name or number + full street name + town/city. Example: '123 High Street, Manchester' or 'The Old Factory, Station Road, Leeds'. This is used for record identification.

property_type.description: Current/existing use of the property before any proposed conversion. Choose from: Office (commercial office buildings), Residential (houses/flats currently in residential use), Land (vacant development plots), Hotel, Retail (shops/shopping centres), HMO (house in multiple occupation), Industrial (warehouses/factories), Pub, Air Space (development rights above existing buildings), Part Built (partially constructed developments), Care Home, GP Surgery, Community Use (libraries/community centres), Mixed Use (combination of uses), Petrol Station, Garages, Hospital, TBC (to be confirmed if unclear). Use null only if property type cannot be determined.

proposed_use.description: Intended future use or conversion type if stated in the listing (e.g., 'Residential conversion', 'Student accommodation', 'Mixed-use development', 'Hotel conversion'). Use null if no change of use is proposed or information not available.

project_type.description: Nature of the development project. Choose from: Construction (new build from ground up), Refurbishment (renovation of existing structure), Regeneration (area-wide improvement), Investment (buy-to-hold/income generating), Planning (planning gain opportunity), Turn (quick cosmetic improvements for resale), Break Up (splitting into separate units), TBC (unclear from information). Use null if cannot be determined.

tenure.description: Legal ownership structure. Choose from: Freehold (outright ownership including land), Virtual Freehold (very long lease, typically 999 years), Leasehold (time-limited ownership), Part FH/LH (mixed tenure - some freehold, some leasehold), TBC (unclear from listing). Use null if completely unspecified.

offer_type.description: Vendor's deal structure/conditions. Choose from: Unconditional (immediate purchase with no planning requirements), Subject To Planning (sale conditional on obtaining planning permission), Option (right to purchase at future date), Joint Venture (partnership development opportunity), Both Uncon & STPP (vendor offering both structures), Company Acquisition (buying the entity not just the asset), Uncon with delayed Completion (unconditional but delayed settlement), Unconditional with Overage (includes profit share clause), TBC (terms unclear). Use null if not specified.

footprint_acres.description: Total site area in acres. Convert from hectares if needed (1 hectare = 2.47 acres). For very small sites, use decimal (e.g., 0.25 for quarter acre). Use 'TBC' string if size mentioned but value unclear. Use null if no site area information provided.

existing_private_units.description: Number of existing market-rate residential units on site currently. Count only private/market units, not affordable. Use 0 for vacant land. Use 'TBC' string if units exist but count unknown. Use null if information not provided.

existing_affordable_units.description: Number of existing affordable/social housing units on site. Use 0 if none exist. Use 'TBC' string if affordable units present but number unclear. Use null if no information.

existing_commercial_gia_sqft.description: Existing commercial floor area - Gross Internal Area in square feet (measured to internal face of perimeter walls, includes circulation, toilets, plant rooms). Convert from sqm if needed (1 sqm = 10.764 sqft). Use 'TBC' string if GIA exists but value unknown. Use null if no existing commercial space.

existing_commercial_nia_sqft.description: Existing commercial floor area - Net Internal Area in square feet (usable floor space excluding toilets, circulation, plant). Always less than GIA. Convert from sqm if needed. Use 'TBC' string if NIA referenced but unclear. Use null if not provided.

proposed_private_units.description: Number of market-rate residential units in the proposed development scheme. This is post-development unit count for private sale units. Use 'TBC' string if scheme includes private units but count unknown. Use null if no development scheme information.

proposed_affordable_units.description: Number of affordable/social housing units in proposed development. Often expressed as percentage (e.g., '35% affordable' - calculate actual unit number if total units known). Use 'TBC' string if affordable requirement stated but number unclear. Use null if not specified.

proposed_resi_gia_sqft.description: Proposed residential floor area - Gross Internal Area in square feet. This is the total residential space in the development scheme including all units. Convert from sqm if needed (1 sqm = 10.764 sqft). Use 'TBC' string if GIA mentioned but value unknown. Use null if not provided.

proposed_resi_nia_sqft.description: Proposed residential floor area - Net Internal Area in square feet. The usable residential space excluding common areas. Convert from sqm if needed. Use 'TBC' string if referenced but unclear. Use null if not stated.

proposed_commercial_gia_sqft.description: Proposed commercial floor area - Gross Internal Area in square feet for non-residential uses in the development (retail, office, etc.). Convert from sqm if needed. Use 'TBC' string if commercial element mentioned but size unknown. Use null if no commercial component.

proposed_commercial_nia_sqft.description: Proposed commercial floor area - Net Internal Area in square feet. Usable commercial space in development. Convert from sqm if needed. Use 'TBC' string if unclear. Use null if not provided.

existing_resi_gia_sqft.description: Existing residential floor area - Gross Internal Area in square feet. Current residential space on site before any development. Convert from sqm if needed. Use 'TBC' string if residential space exists but size unknown. Use null if no existing residential or information not available.

existing_resi_nia_sqft.description: Existing residential floor area - Net Internal Area in square feet. Current usable residential space. Convert from sqm if needed. Use 'TBC' string if unclear. Use null if not stated.

price.description: Price information as stated in listing. Include '£' symbol and full amount (e.g., '£2,500,000', 'Guide £1.8m', 'Offers in excess of £950,000'). For uncertain pricing use exact text like 'Price on Application', 'Offers invited', 'Guide price available on request'. Use special value 'DELETE' to indicate that an incorrect existing price value should be removed from database. Use null if genuinely no price indication whatsoever.

rough_cut_per_sqft.description: Derived price per square foot (£/sqft) calculated by dividing total price by relevant floor area (typically proposed GIA for development sites, or existing GIA for investment properties). Only populate if both price and floor area are clearly stated. Use 'TBC' string if calculation should be possible but values are unclear. Use null if insufficient information to calculate.

agent.description: Individual agent or contact person name handling the sale (e.g., 'John Smith', 'Sarah Williams'). Use null if only company name provided or no agent details.

agent_company.description: Estate agent or auctioneer firm name (e.g., 'Savills', 'Knight Frank', 'Allsop LLP', 'SDL Auctions'). Use the formal company name as it appears in the listing. Use null if no agent company specified.

auction.description: Flag indicating if property is being sold via auction. Choose: 'Yes' (confirmed auction sale with date/details), 'No' (private treaty/normal sale), 'TBC' (auction mentioned but details unclear or property may be withdrawn). Use null only if sale method completely unspecified.

auction_date.description: Scheduled auction date if property is going to auction. Use ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD) or UK readable format (e.g., '15 March 2024', '15/03/2024'). Use 'TBC' string if auction confirmed but date not yet set. Use null if not an auction or date not mentioned.

auction_lot_number.description: Auction catalogue lot number or reference (e.g., 'Lot 47', 'Lot 123A'). Use null if not an auction sale or lot number not specified.

lpa.description: Local Planning Authority - the council with planning jurisdiction (e.g., 'London Borough of Hackney', 'Manchester City Council', 'Elmbridge Borough Council'). Important for understanding planning context. Use null if not stated or unclear.

epc_grade.description: Energy Performance Certificate letter grade from A (most efficient) to G (least efficient). Use the current EPC rating, not any projected rating. Common format is single letter (e.g., 'C', 'D'). Use null if EPC not mentioned.

epc_score.description: Energy Performance Certificate numeric score (typically 1-100 scale where higher is better). This accompanies the letter grade. Use 'TBC' string if score mentioned but value unclear. Use null if no numeric score provided.

council_charity_disposal.description: Indicates if property is being sold by a council (local authority) or charity. These sales may have special conditions or community interest. Choose: 'Yes' (confirmed council or charity disposal), 'No' (private vendor), 'TBC' (unclear ownership but possible public sector). Use null if vendor type not specified.

receivership.description: Indicates if the property/asset is being sold by a receiver/administrator due to insolvency or financial distress. These are often motivated sales. Choose: 'Yes' (confirmed receivership sale, may mention 'LPA Receiver', 'Administrator', 'Insolvency'), 'No' (normal sale), 'TBC' (language suggests distressed sale but not confirmed). Use null if no indication either way.
